name: yt-transcript
description: A Node.js application to fetch YouTube video transcripts using Oxylabs API

scripts.test-api: node -e "import('./src/YouTubeTranscriptFetcher.js').then(m => { const f = new m.default(process.env.OXYLABS_USERNAME, process.env.OXYLABS_PASSWORD); return f.getTranscriptText('J1jm4MoZw5Y', 'en', 'auto_generated'); }).then(t => console.log('âœ… API Test Passed. Transcript length:', t.length)).catch(console.error)"
